Articles.Content:
Hello, I am running mods, and I don't exactly have a list. I do have a screenshot of my gamedata folder.

Basically, when I put on launch clamps, they, well, here's a picture. (btw, "Ezreb" has a custom flag in it.)

Also notice that they don't go into the staging. This is what happens.

Also, I can't r-click them and make them decouple.

WHAT IS GOING ON!

Thanks!

(btw, I have a feeling that it is caused by extraplanetary launchpads.)

(btbtw, I am running 0.25)
THIS HAS BEEN SOLLVED! I fixed it by modifying the module manager file for extraplanetary launchpads, just delete that part for launch clamps!
Can you post about this on the EL thread? That is more likely to get taniwha's attention now that you've narrowed it down.
